revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt Silver |image = [[File:Mt Silver.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Mt Silver. |tokens = 10,000 |location = On the west end of Route 28. }} '''Mt Silver''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Pokémon & Dungeon Stats==
The following pokémon can be found in this dungeon.
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Random Encounter !! Base Health !! Boss !! Base Health= |- | [[File:Ponyta.png|40px]] Ponyta || rowspan=10| <center> 130,500 || rowspan=10| [[File:Larvitar.png|40px]] Larvitar || rowspan=10|<center> 840,000 |- | [[File:Doduo.png|40px]] Doduo |- | [[File:Tangela.png|40px]] Tangela |- | [[File:Sneasel.png|40px]] Sneasel |- | [[File:Ursaring.png|40px]] Ursaring |- | [[File:Donphan.png|40px]] Donphan |- | [[File:Teddiursa.png|40px]] Teddiursa |- | [[File:Phanpy.png|40px]] Phanpy |- | [[File:Quagsire.png|40px]] Quagsire |- | [[File:Misdreavus.png|40px]] Misdreavus |- |}
